`#line(length: 75%)`{=typst}

A quick and simple Italian staple inspired by James May's 'Oh Cook!'

`#text(1.5em)[#underline[Ingredients]]`{=typst}

- 1/4lb pancetta
- 3 cloves garlic
- 1lb of chopped mushrooms
- 1 whole egg plus 1 egg yolk
- 3/4 cup parmesan cheese
- 2 cups penne (or other pasta)

`#text(1.5em)[#underline[Directions]]`{=typst}

1. Mix eggs & cheese and set aside
2. Boil pasta for 10 mins
3. Fry off pancetta & garlic on medium heat until browned then drain excess grease
5. Add mushrooms and fry until soft
6. Drain cooked pasta and add to mix
7. Add egg & cheese mix, begin stirring immediately
8. Kill the heat but continue stirring mix for 2-3 mins
